experience.title: Embedded Electrical Team Member
experience.description: In Electrical Vehicle Group, I designed the Battery Management System of an electrical vehicle which would check for imbalance in the battery pack and do the passive balancing when required with an accuracy of 0.5mV. The Battery Management System is highly scalable as well as programmable and can be used for any Li ion cell chemistry irrespective of nominal cell voltage.I also designed the Protection Module for the battery pack which would provide protection to battery pack as well as Battery Management System against overcurrent, overvoltage and short circuit fault. I designed all the PCB layout for different modules of BMS myself.I am currently working on making the real time operating system (RTOS) of the vehicle using NXP K64 ARM based MCU.
experience.description_html: In Electrical Vehicle Group, I designed the Battery Management System of an electrical vehicle which would check for imbalance in the battery pack and do the passive balancing when required with an accuracy of 0.5mV. The Battery Management System is highly scalable as well as programmable and can be used for any Li ion cell chemistry irrespective of nominal cell voltage.I also designed the Protection Module for the battery pack which would provide protection to battery pack as well as Battery Management System against overcurrent, overvoltage and short circuit fault. I designed all the PCB layout for different modules of BMS myself.I am currently working on making the real time operating system (RTOS) of the vehicle using NXP K64 ARM based MCU.

positions.subtitle: Technology Adventure Society
positions.description: As a Governor of Technology Adventure Society, I spearheaded a 2-tier team of 60 people to successfully conduct adventure activities inside as well as outside the IIT campus.In my tenure as a Governor, I successfully led my team to organise some of the most crowd gathering events of IIT Kharagpur.  We organised an introductory seminar for the freshers to tell them about various aspects of society and the events that the society organise.We successfully organised a cycle trip in which 80 UG 1st yrs were taken on a trip to various landmarks of IIT Kharagpur campus and finally to a nearby forest for camping.My team successfully organized Rappelling and Zip-line event in IIT Kharagpur campus with a participation of 500+ student and faculty.I successfully organized and led Winter and Summer Treks of 10 days each for 40 students at subsidized cost.
positions.title: Governor
positions.description_html:
As a Governor of Technology Adventure Society, I spearheaded a 2-tier team of 60 people to successfully conduct adventure activities inside as well as outside the IIT campus.

In my tenure as a Governor, I successfully led my team to organise some of the most crowd gathering events of IIT Kharagpur.
We organised an introductory seminar for the freshers to tell them about various aspects of society and the events that the society organise.
We successfully organised a cycle trip in which 80 UG 1st yrs were taken on a trip to various landmarks of IIT Kharagpur campus and finally to a nearby forest for camping.
My team successfully organized Rappelling and Zip-line event in IIT Kharagpur campus with a participation of 500+ student and faculty.
I successfully organized and led Winter and Summer Treks of 10 days each for 40 students at subsidized cost.

positions.subtitle: Technology Adventure Society
positions.description: As a member of Technology Adventure Society, I learned how to manage events with participation as much as 500. As a member, I was assigned the responsibility to deal with various organiser to organise an event at the lowest possible cost. I also helped my juniors learn the same skills.My other work as a member was to publicise the event within the IIT Kharagpur campus, which included online as well as offline publicity.As a member, I represented Technology Adventure Society in its introductory seminar.
positions.title: Member
positions.description_html:
As a member of Technology Adventure Society, I learned how to manage events with participation as much as 500.
As a member, I was assigned the responsibility to deal with various organiser to organise an event at the lowest possible cost. I also helped my juniors learn the same skills.
My other work as a member was to publicise the event within the IIT Kharagpur campus, which included online as well as offline publicity.
As a member, I represented Technology Adventure Society in its introductory seminar.

education.title: Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur
education.description: Activities and Societies: Electrical Vehicle Group, Technology Adventure Society At IIT Kharagpur, I am pursuing my major in Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering and a minor in Mathematics Department. I am actively involved in various activities apart from my academics. I am a UG researcher at Electrical Vehicle Research Group. I am also Governor of Technology Adventure Society.
education.description_html: Activities and Societies: Electrical Vehicle Group, Technology Adventure Society

education.title: K L Arya D.A.V. Public School,
I.D.D.A.V. Public School
education.description: Activities and Societies: Debating Group, Drama Club, Science Club During my school days, I was actively involved in various co-curricular activities. I was elected as House Captain of my House in 9th class. My role as a House Captain was to ensure thorough participation of my house in various inter-house competitions. Further in my 10th class, I was nominated as School Prefect. I acted as a channel of communication between students and school administration. I also looked after the organisation of inter house events and annual day celebration.
education.description_html: Activities and Societies: Debating Group, Drama Club, Science Club

volunteer_experience.info: I volunteered to be a NCC cadet in my 1st yr at IIT Kharagpur. The role of NCC is to act as 4th line of defence of the country and to actively participate in serving the society during the time of crisis. NCC moto says "Unity and Discipline" which are some of qualities which I learned during my 2 years as a cadet. I received weapon and disaster relief training as a NCC cadet.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: National Cadet Corps
volunteer_experience.title: Cadet
